blocks.content: Welcome to the Testing & Synthetic section. In this tutorial, we’ll walk through testing and synthetic apps and explain each area to make the site easy to navigate.
Let’s start by navigating to the Testing & Synthetics section.

Let’s explore the first page. Testing and Synthetics is made up of two sections: Performance and Synthetics.
The Performance section allows you to create Grafana Cloud k6 tests. Grafana Cloud k6 is a performance testing platform that lets you easily run cloud-based performance tests for millions of users.
Grafana Cloud Synthetic Monitoring proactively monitors the performance of your critical user flows, websites, and APIs from locations around the world.
